name: elm-webpack-starter
description: Webpack setup for writing Elm apps
author: Peter Morawiec

scripts.build: rimraf dist && webpack && mv dist/*.eot dist/static/css/ && mv dist/*.woff* dist/static/css/ && mv dist/*.svg dist/static/css/ && mv dist/*.ttf dist/static/css/
scripts.reinstall: npm i rimraf && rimraf node_modules && npm uninstall -g elm && npm i -g elm && npm i && elm package install
